tradestock.model.tradeoperation

Class TradeModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • tradestock.model.tradeoperation.TradeModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TradeOperation<Stock>

    public class TradeModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements TradeOperation<Stock>
    This class represent a TradeModel implements TradeOperation interface. A TradeOModel could create portfolio, but stocks, get cost, get value, get portfolio list, get portfolio state add empty stock, create strategy, apply strategy, save and read strategy.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TradeModel.TradeBuilder
      This class is a builder class implements TradeOperationBuilder interface.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TradeModel

        public TradeModel()
        Construct a TradeModel object. Default API is GetPrice object, and default commission fee is 5.

      • TradeModel

        public TradeModel(IGetPrice api,
                  double fee)
        Construct a TradeModel object by given api and commission fee. If api is null, or commission fee is negative, this method will throw IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        api - an IGetPrice object
        fee - commission fee

      • savePortfolio

        public void savePortfolio(java.lang.String portfolioName,
                          java.lang.String fileName)
        Save a portfolio into a XML file by given portfolio name and file name. If the file name already exists, this method will overwrite the file. Save portfolio name, all stock symbols and its amount and price of each share of stock
        Specified by:
        savePortfolio in interface TradeOperation<Stock>
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - given portfolio name
        fileName - given save file name

      • readPortfolio

        public void readPortfolio(java.lang.String fileName)
        Read a XML file to get a portfolio. If the file dose not exist, this method will throw IllegalArgumentException. The format of file must be as follows: (cost is the price of each share)
        <portfolio>
        <portfolio-name>p1</portfolio-name>
        <stock>
        <stock-symbol>MSFT</stock-symbol>
        <transaction-history>
        <date>2019-03-11</date>
        <sell>false</sell>
        <volume>36.0</volume>
        <cost>100.0</cost>
        </transaction-history>
        ...
        </stock>
        ...
        </portfolio>
        All the tags must be lower case. All content must in root tag portfolio. User cannot change order of tags. A portfolio can have one or more stocks, and a stock can have one or more transaction-history. Format of date must be yyyy-mm-dd. Sell must be true or false. Other tags are invalid. If portfolio name already exists, the method will overwrite portfolio in map.
        Specified by:
        readPortfolio in interface TradeOperation<Stock>
        Parameters:
        fileName - given file name

      • createStrategyNoEndEqualPercent

                                            double money,
                                            java.time.LocalDate beginDate,
